stories.title: Phil Spencer is exiting Microsoft as AI executive takes over Xbox
stories.summary: Phil Spencer is leaving Microsoft as an AI executive takes over Xbox leadership.

stories.title: New Jersey Residents Defeat AI Data Center Plan
stories.summary: New Jersey residents defeated an AI data center project through a local vote.

stories.title: AI Becomes the Tone Police for White-Collar Workers
stories.summary: AI tools now analyze tone in meetings, emails, and chats for white-collar workers.

stories.title: AgentCheck – AI Bot Posture Leaderboard
stories.summary: A leaderboard ranking AI bots by their posture using robots.txt and llms.txt files.

stories.title: Delegate – AI Engineering Manager for Async Multitasking
stories.summary: An AI engineering manager tool that automates tasks for async multitasking.
